005package edu.wpi.first.networktables;
006
007/**
008 * Flag values for use with topic listeners.
009 *
010 * <p>The flags are a bitmask and must be OR'ed together to indicate the combination of events
011 * desired to be received.
012 *
013 * <p>The constants kPublish, kUnpublish, and kProperties represent different events that can occur
014 * to topics.
015 */
016public enum TopicListenerFlags {
017  ; // no enum values
018
019  /**
020   * Initial listener addition.
021   *
022   * <p>Set this flag to receive immediate notification of topics matching the flag criteria
023   * (generally only useful when combined with kPublish).
024   */
025  public static final int kImmediate = 0x01;
026
027  /**
028   * Newly published topic.
029   *
030   * <p>Set this flag to receive a notification when a topic is initially published.
031   */
032  public static final int kPublish = 0x02;
033
034  /**
035   * Topic has no more publishers.
036   *
037   * <p>Set this flag to receive a notification when a topic has no more publishers.
038   */
039  public static final int kUnpublish = 0x04;
040
041  /**
042   * Topic's properties changed.
043   *
044   * <p>Set this flag to receive a notification when an topic's properties change.
045   */
046  public static final int kProperties = 0x08;
047}
